4317670.name: Medieval Battle: Food Truck
4317670.description:
Cook fast. Cook smart. Feed the army to victory.

Medieval Battle: Food Truck is a roguelike cooking game where your food truck is just as vital as the battlefield, and burger flipping can be more important than swinging swords. Every meal you serve directly strengthens your army, and the quality of your cooking can decide the fate of the war. Don't burn your chance!

Cook to win!

Your army fights better with full stomachs. Each burger you prepare grants combat bonuses based on:

  •  ingredient quality - use only hand-picked, and the best for the best 

  •  preparation precision - master your skills to secure victory

  •  customer preferences - cater to their taste buds to strengthen them even more

  •  and a touch of fantasy magic - use fantastical spices and ingredients to make your meals truly magical!

Burn it, rush it, or ignore what your customers want, and your soldiers will pay the price.

Roguelike runs, hard choices

Each run challenges you with:

  •  a limited stock of ingredients

  •  randomized upgrades and rewards

  •  escalating enemy threats

Do you use rare ingredients now, or save them for a tougher battle later?

Upgrade your food truck

Victory earns you upgrades:

  •  unlock new ingredients (mundane and fantastical)

  •  install new kitchen tools

  •  replace old gear with faster, better, stronger equipment

Turn a rusty cart into a legendary war kitchen!

Battle across dangerous biomes

Travel with your army through multiple biomes, each featuring:

  •  unique enemies

  •  different customer demands

  •  biome-specific ingredients and modifiers

What works in one land may fail miserably in another.

A war fueled by food

In Medieval Battle: Food Truck, strategy isn’t just about combat - it’s about cooking under pressure, adapting to chaos, and mastering your craft one burger at a time.

Feed the army. Win the war. Upgrade the truck. Repeat.
4317670.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 繁体中文, 简体中文, 日语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
